title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin previews the Divisional Round of the NFL playoffs and believes this one team is clearly the most dominant. He discusses the fallout from the Cowboys disappointing loss in the playoffs and why we need to stop calling their best players "stars". He shares his favorite bets for the NFL playoffs in the Divisional Round for this week's "Blazin 4". Plus, Fox Sports NFL analyst Mark Sanchez joins the show to tell Colin if Josh Allen and the Bills have a chance to upset Patrick Mahomes and the Chiefs. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
